name: Windows Defender Threat Detection Disabled
description: Detects disabling Windows Defender threat protection
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:(5001 OR 5010 OR 5012 OR 5101))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:(5001 OR 5010 OR 5012 OR 5101))`
